verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, When ye <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> you, then shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7673>keep<s%> a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H2168>prune<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, and <S%H622>gather<s%> in the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> thereof;

But in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> shall be a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%>, a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: thou shalt neither <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H7704>field<s%>, nor <S%H2168>prune<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>.

That which groweth of its own <S%H5599>accord<s%> of thy <S%H7105>harvest<s%> thou shalt not <S%H7114>reap<s%>, neither <S%H1219>gather<s%> the <S%H6025>grapes<s%> of thy vine <S%H5139>undressed<s%>: for it is a <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H402>meat<s%> for you; for thee, and for thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and for thy <S%H519>maid<s%>, and for thy hired <S%H7916>servant<s%>, and for thy <S%H8453>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> with thee,
And for thy <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and for the <S%H2416>beast<s%> that are in thy <S%H776>land<s%>, shall all the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof be <S%H398>meat<s%>.

¶ And thou shalt <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> unto thee, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; and the <S%H3117>space<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> shall be unto thee <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

Then shalt thou cause the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> of the <S%H8643>jubile<s%> to <S%H5674>sound<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%> shall ye make the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H5674>sound<s%> throughout all your <S%H776>land<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> the <S%H2572%H8141>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> unto all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof: it shall be a <S%H3104>jubile<s%> unto you; and ye shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>, and ye shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H4940>family<s%>.

A <S%H3104>jubile<s%> shall that <S%H2572%H8141>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> be unto you: ye shall not <S%H2232>sow<s%>, neither <S%H7114>reap<s%> that which <S%H5599>groweth<s%> of itself in it, nor <S%H1219>gather<s%> the grapes in it of thy vine <S%H5139>undressed<s%>.
For it is the <S%H3104>jubile<s%>; it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto you: ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof out of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.
In the <S%H8141>year<s%> of this <S%H3104>jubile<s%> ye shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

And if thou <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H4465>ought<s%> unto thy <S%H5997>neighbour<s%>, or <S%H7069>buyest<s%> ought of thy <S%H5997>neighbour's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, ye shall not <S%H3238>oppress<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another<s%>:

According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>jubile<s%> thou shalt <S%H7069>buy<s%> of thy <S%H5997>neighbour<s%>, and according unto the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> he shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> unto thee:

<S%H6310>According<s%> to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H7235>increase<s%> the <S%H4736>price<s%> thereof, and <S%H6310>according<s%> to the <S%H4591>fewness<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H4591>diminish<s%> the <S%H4736>price<s%> of it: for according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the years of the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> doth he <S%H4376>sell<s%> unto thee.
Ye shall not therefore <S%H3238>oppress<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5997>another<s%>; but thou shalt <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>: for I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ Wherefore ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; and ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%>.
And the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H7648>fill<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein in <S%H983>safety<s%>.
And if ye shall <S%H559>say<s%>, What shall we <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>? behold, we shall not <S%H2232>sow<s%>, nor <S%H622>gather<s%> in our <S%H8393>increase<s%>:

Then I will <S%H6680>command<s%> my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon you in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and it shall bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H8393>fruit<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> yet of <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8393>fruit<s%> until the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>; until her <S%H8393>fruits<s%> come <S%H935>in<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H3465>old<s%> store.
¶ The <S%H776>land<s%> shall not be <S%H4376>sold<s%> for <S%H6783>ever<s%>: for the <S%H776>land<s%> is mine; for ye are <S%H1616>strangers<s%> and <S%H8453>sojourners<s%> with me.
And in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>grant<s%> a <S%H1353>redemption<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%>.

¶ If thy <S%H251>brother<s%> be waxen <S%H4134>poor<s%>, and hath <S%H4376>sold<s%> away some of his <S%H272>possession<s%>, and if any of his <S%H7138>kin<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it, then shall he <S%H1350>redeem<s%> that which his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4465>sold<s%>.
And if the <S%H376>man<s%> have none to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it, and <S%H3027>himself<s%> be <S%H1767%H5381>able<s%> to <S%H4672%H1353>redeem<s%> it;

Then let him <S%H2803>count<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H4465>sale<s%> thereof, and <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H5736>overplus<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> to whom he <S%H4376>sold<s%> it; that he may <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

But if <S%H3027>he<s%> be not <S%H1767>able<s%> to <S%H4672%H7725>restore<s%> it to him, then that which is <S%H4465>sold<s%> shall remain in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that hath <S%H7069>bought<s%> it until the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubile<s%>: and in the <S%H3104>jubile<s%> it shall go <S%H3318>out<s%>, and he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> a <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in a <S%H2346>walled<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, then he may <S%H1353>redeem<s%> it within a <S%H8552>whole<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after it is <S%H4465>sold<s%>; within a full <S%H3117>year<s%> may he <S%H1353>redeem<s%> it.

And if it be not <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> within the <S%H4390>space<s%> of a <S%H8549>full<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, then the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is in the <S%H2346>walled<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H6965>established<s%> for <S%H6783>ever<s%> to him that <S%H7069>bought<s%> it throughout his <S%H1755>generations<s%>: it shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H3104>jubile<s%>.

But the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H2691>villages<s%> which have no <S%H2346>wall<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> them shall be <S%H2803>counted<s%> as the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>: they may be <S%H1353>redeemed<s%>, and they shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H3104>jubile<s%>.

Notwithstanding the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H272>possession<s%>, may the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H1353>redeem<s%> at any <S%H5769>time<s%>.

And if a man <S%H1350>purchase<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, then the <S%H1004>house<s%> that was <S%H4465>sold<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H272>possession<s%>, shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the year of <S%H3104>jubile<s%>: for the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> are their <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
But the <S%H7704>field<s%> of the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of their <S%H5892>cities<s%> may not be <S%H4376>sold<s%>; for it is their <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H272>possession<s%>.

¶ And if thy <S%H251>brother<s%> be waxen <S%H4134>poor<s%>, and fallen in <S%H4131>decay<s%> with <S%H3027>thee<s%>; then thou shalt <S%H2388>relieve<s%> him: yea, though he be a <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, or a <S%H8453>sojourner<s%>; that he may <S%H2416>live<s%> with thee.
<S%H3947>Take<s%> thou no <S%H5392>usury<s%> of him, or <S%H8636>increase<s%>: but <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>; that thy <S%H251>brother<s%> may <S%H2416>live<s%> with thee.
Thou shalt not <S%H5414>give<s%> him thy <S%H3701>money<s%> upon <S%H5392>usury<s%>, nor <S%H5414>lend<s%> him thy <S%H400>victuals<s%> for <S%H4768>increase<s%>.

I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and to be your <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ And if thy <S%H251>brother<s%> that dwelleth by thee be waxen <S%H4134>poor<s%>, and be <S%H4376>sold<s%> unto thee; thou shalt not <S%H5647>compel<s%> him to <S%H5656>serve<s%> as a <S%H5650>bondservant<s%>:
But as an hired <S%H7916>servant<s%>, and as a <S%H8453>sojourner<s%>, he shall be with thee, and shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee unto the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubile<s%>:

And then shall he <S%H3318>depart<s%> from thee, both he and his <S%H1121>children<s%> with him, and shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his own <S%H4940>family<s%>, and unto the <S%H272>possession<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall he <S%H7725>return<s%>.
For they are my <S%H5650>servants<s%>, which I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: they shall not be <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H4466>as<s%> <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H7287>rule<s%> over him with <S%H6531>rigour<s%>; but shalt <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

Both thy <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>, and thy <S%H519>bondmaids<s%>, which thou shalt have, shall be of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> you; of them shall ye <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> and <S%H519>bondmaids<s%>.

Moreover of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H8453>strangers<s%> that do <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> among you, of them shall ye <S%H7069>buy<s%>, and of their <S%H4940>families<s%> that are with you, which they <S%H3205>begat<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%>: and they shall be your <S%H272>possession<s%>.

And ye shall take them as an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> them for a <S%H272>possession<s%>; they shall be your <S%H5647>bondmen<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: but over your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, ye shall not <S%H7287>rule<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> over <S%H251>another<s%> with <S%H6531>rigour<s%>.

¶ And if a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> or <S%H8453>stranger<s%> wax <S%H5381>rich<s%> by <S%H3027>thee<s%>, and thy <S%H251>brother<s%> that dwelleth by him wax <S%H4134>poor<s%>, and <S%H4376>sell<s%> himself unto the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> or <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> by thee, or to the <S%H6133>stock<s%> of the <S%H1616>stranger's<s%> <S%H4940>family<s%>:
<S%H310>After<s%> that he is <S%H4376>sold<s%> he may be redeemed <S%H1353>again<s%>; <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H251>brethren<s%> may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> him:

Either his <S%H1730>uncle<s%>, or his <S%H1730>uncle's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> him, or any that is <S%H7607>nigh<s%> of <S%H1320>kin<s%> unto him of his <S%H4940>family<s%> may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> him; or if he be <S%H5381>able<s%>, he may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H3027>himself<s%>.

And he shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> with him that <S%H7069>bought<s%> him from the <S%H8141>year<s%> that he was <S%H4376>sold<s%> to him unto the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubile<s%>: and the <S%H3701>price<s%> of his <S%H4465>sale<s%> shall be according unto the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%>, according to the <S%H3117>time<s%> of an hired <S%H7916>servant<s%> shall it be with him.

If there be yet <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> behind, <S%H6310>according<s%> unto them he shall give <S%H7725>again<s%> the price of his <S%H1353>redemption<s%> out of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that he was <S%H4736>bought<s%> for.

And if there <S%H7604>remain<s%> but <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> unto the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubile<s%>, then he shall <S%H2803>count<s%> with him, and <S%H6310>according<s%> unto his <S%H8141>years<s%> shall he give him <S%H7725>again<s%> the price of his <S%H1353>redemption<s%>.
And as a <S%H8141%H8141>yearly<s%> hired <S%H7916>servant<s%> shall he be with him: and the other shall not <S%H7287>rule<s%> with <S%H6531>rigour<s%> over him in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>.
And if he be not <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> in these years, then he shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubile<s%>, both he, and his <S%H1121>children<s%> with him.

For unto me the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H5650>servants<s%>; they are my <S%H5650>servants<s%> whom I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
